# Inquisition (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Heironeous]], [[Pholtus]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Gain a +4 bonus on dispel checks.

**Inquisition Domain Spells**

**1 [[Detect Chaos (Spell)|Detect Chaos]]:** Reveals chaotic creatures, spells, or objects.

**2 [[Zone of Truth (Spell)|Zone of Truth]]:** Subjects within range cannot lie.

**3 [[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|Detect Thoughts]]:** Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

**4 [[Discern Lies (Spell)|Discern Lies]]:** Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

**5 [[True Seeing (Spell)|True Seeing]] <sup>M</sup>:** Lets you see all things as they really are.

**6 [[Geas_Quest (Spell)|Geas/Quest]]:** As *[[Geas, Lesser (Spell)|lesser geas]],* plus it affects any creature.

**7 [[Dictum (Spell)|Dictum]]:** Kills, paralyzes, slows, or deafens nonlawful subjects.

**8 [[Shield of Law (Spell)|Shield of Law]] <sup>F</sup>:** +4 AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against chaotic spells.

**9 [[Imprisonment (Spell)|Imprisonment]]:** Entombs subject beneath the earth.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 275 |
|---|---|
| | Complete Divine (WotC), pg. 139 |
